thread.title: Bodies of recovered fishermen 'slipped out of lifejackets'
thread.title_full: Bodies of recovered fishermen 'slipped out of lifejackets' | News24

author: news24.com
title: Bodies of recovered fishermen 'slipped out of lifejackets'
text:
Cape Town â€“ The bodies of two missing fishermen who had to abandon their stricken trawler were recovered but then lost to the ocean, a Viking Fishing director confirmed on Monday.
"We have two confirmed losses. As the bodies were being recovered, two slipped out of their lifejackets into the ocean," financial director Rory Williams told News24.
He said the search was on for a third fisherman.
"Realistically, I suppose he is presumed drowned."
